name: The Dust Bowl
description:
Title: The Dust Bowl

Platform: Text-based Adventure

Genre: Text

Rating: T

Target Market: history buffs

Game Overview: You play as a farmer during the dust bowl and great depression. You have to make decisions that determine the outcome of your character. The dust bowl was the name that was given to the drought-stricken southern plains region of the United States. During this time they suffered severe dust storms during a drought in the 1930s.

Instructions: Download the HTML file to play

Greggory McQueary - Game Designer
